xwikidoc.name: FontAwesome
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: ## General settings xwiki.iconset.type = font xwiki.iconset.ssx = IconThemes.FontAwesome xwiki.iconset.jsx = IconThemes.FontAwesome xwiki.iconset.render.wiki = {{html clean="false"}}{{/html}} xwiki.iconset.render.html = xwiki.iconset.icon.cssClass = fa fa-$icon ## XWiki Icon Set (see: http://design.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Proposal/XWiki+Icon+Set). home = home wiki = globe space = folder page = file-o check = check add = plus anchor = anchor terminal = terminal list = list-alt branch = code-fork down = arrow-down up = arrow-up left = arrow-left right = arrow-right arrows = arrows-alt repeat = repeat undo = undo refresh = refresh rotate-left = rotate-left rotate-right = rotate-right switch = random random = random attach = paperclip shopping-cart = shopping-cart bell = bell trash = trash bomb = bomb book = book cube = cube cubes = cubes briefcase = briefcase bug = bug building = building caret-down = caret-down caret-up = caret-up caret-right = caret-right calculator = calculator calendar = calendar camera = camera remove = times-circle cross = times car = car truck = truck chart-bar = bar-chart-o chart-organisation = sitemap cloud = cloud clock = clock-o cog = cog comment = comment comments = comments desktop = desktop contrast = adjust eject = eject step-forward = step-forward step-backward = step-backward fast-forward = fast-forward backward = backward play = play pause = pause stop = stop gamepad = gamepad credit-card = credit-card coffee = coffee cut = cut database = database delete = minus-circle floppy-disk = floppy-o glass =
